## Step I

```{r  step_I}

# Q1
  # import data 
step_i_df <- tribble(
  ~'x',  ~'y',
  17, 1963, 
  21, 1997, 
  25, 2046, 
  29, 2051, 
  33, 2059, 
  37, 2071,
  41, 2094,) %>%
  data.frame() %>% 
  # data manipulation
  mutate(x_inv = 1/(y + 273))
  
  

  # visualization
step_i_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = x_inv, y = y)) + 
  geom_point()
# Q2
  # fit a straight line
  # define linear fit
step_i_fit <- lm(step_i_df$y ~ step_i_df$x_inv)
  # record coefficients
step_i_coef <- step_i_fit %>%
  coef() %>%
  formatC(format = "e", digits = 2)
  # show coefficients
tibble(intercept = step_i_coef[1], 
       slope = step_i_coef[2]) %>%
  kable()
```
